p: Medicinal plants remain a good source of diverse, natural and biologically active compounds. The presence of these phytochemicals contributes to beneficial activities such as antioxidant and antihyperglycemia, making plants such as C. roseus an attractive alternative approach for treating diabetes and its complications. On the basis of the results obtained in this study, vindoline and C. roseusâ€™ methanolic and aqueous leaf extract may be used in pharmaceutical applications especially in the management of diabetes.
